channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: There is a pach of grass outside of 3 Symphony Road that has been adopted by LA highways in 2017 as per the attached plan - this area of grass falls into the responsibility of GCC highways when the areas were adopted in 2017, 4th July
item.description:
Grass areas outside of 3 Symphony Road, Badgeworth, Cheltenham, GL51 6GJ and grass areas in front of 7, 9 and 11 Symphony Road, Cheltenham, GL51 6GJ.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Symphony Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown verge, 4th July
item.description:
Overgrown verge on corner of Stoke road and Cheltenham road. Reduced visibility from Stoke Road for traffic coming along Cheltenham road. Verge has not been cut this year.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Stoke Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flyposted huge banner on railings at junction, 4th July
item.description:
A huge banner advertising a street market has been flyposted and attached to the railings at the big junction between Thirlestaine Road and the A46 (Bath Road)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Suffolk Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flyposter on telegraph pole again, 4th July
item.description:
Flyposter has been attached to telegraph pole. This is the 3rd time there has been flyposting on the pole in only a few months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 265, Old Bath Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle with punctured tyres, 4th July
item.description:
There's an abandoned white Vauxhall parked on the highway outside numbers 42-44ish. Hasn't been moved in a while, certainly more than four weeks. Some of the tyres appear to have punctures. It does seem to be taxed but its hasn't moved for some time and is making the road look untidy and potentially encouraging anti-social behaviour.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Upper Park Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
